name: Veggie Fajitas
description: Saut√©ed peppers, onions, and mushrooms make up these Veggie Fajitas. Load them into tortillas with vegan sour cream for an easy and flavorful family dinner!
recipeIngredient: 1 large red bell pepper, seeded and sliced
1 large green bell pepper, seeded and sliced
1 large yellow bell pepper, seeded and sliced
8 ounce package cremini or button mushrooms, sliced
pico de gallo or other salsa

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine all spices/salt/pepper for the seasoning mix. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine all spices/salt/pepper for the seasoning mix. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large cast iron pan over medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the oil in a large cast iron pan over medium-high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the peppers, onion and mushrooms and fry for about a minute, stirring frequently.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the peppers, onion and mushrooms and fry for about a minute, stirring frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the seasoning mix in and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently. The veggies should be softened but still slightly crisp and blackened in some areas.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the seasoning mix in and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently. The veggies should be softened but still slightly crisp and blackened in some areas.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and serve immediately in small tortillas with lime wedges and other toppings of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from heat and serve immediately in small tortillas with lime wedges and other toppings of choice.
